summary: Search customer return parcel by at least 4 letters text
description: Search customer return parcel by at least 4 letters text. This API is to improve user experience, user can search for the tracking number instead of typing the full tracking number.

query.name: searchText
query.description: Search tracking number text at least 4 letters

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/station/v1/dop/cr-parcels/search','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("stationId", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("searchText", "TEST12")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/station/v1/dop/cr-parcels/search','GET')
request.add_api_param('stationId', '1234')
request.add_api_param('searchText', 'TEST12')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
